abstract: Valbona Yzeiraj, former manager of dental office in Riverdale, Bronx, is arrested and accused of performing dental work on patients while her boss was out of office, despite having no dental license.
lead_paragraph: Valbona Yzeiraj, charged with reckless endangerment and other counts, harmed at least two people she treated, prosecutors said.

headline.main: Unlicensed Dental Work in the Bronx Leads to Arrest
headline.print_headline: Dental Work, Unlicensed, Leads to Arrest

snippet: Valbona Yzeiraj, charged with reckless endangerment and other counts, harmed at least two people she treated, prosecutors said.
